s0001: Jin Tang Shu Yu was Zhou King Wu's son and King Cheng's younger brother.
s0002: Initially, King Wu and Shu Yu's mother met, dreamed that heaven told King Wu: 'I command this woman to give birth to a son, name Yu, I grant him Tang.'
s0003: When the son was born, characters on his hand said 'Yu', therefore accordingly named him Yu.
s0004: King Wu passed away, King Cheng ascended, Tang had rebellion, Duke of Zhou executed and extinguished Tang.
s0005: King Cheng played with Shu Yu, cut paulownia leaf as jade tablet to give Shu Yu, said: 'With this I enfeoff you.'
s0006: Shi Yi therefore requested to choose day to establish Shu Yu.
s0007: King Cheng said: 'I was just playing with him.'
s0008: Shi Yi said: 'Son of Heaven has no joking words.
s0009: Words then historians record them, rites complete them, music sings them.'
s0010: Thereupon enfeoffed Shu Yu at Tang.
s0011: Tang was east of Yellow River and Fen, one hundred li square, therefore called Tang Shu Yu.
s0012: Surname Ji, courtesy name Zi Yu.
s0013: Tang Shu's son Xie, this was Jin Hou.
s0014: Jin Hou's son Ning Zu, this was Wu Hou.
s0015: Wu Hou's son Fu Ren, this was Cheng Hou.
s0016: Cheng Hou's son Fu, this was Li Hou.
s0017: Li Hou's son Yi Jiu, this was Jing Hou.
s0018: From Jing Hou onward, years can be traced.
s0019: From Tang Shu to Jing Hou five generations, no year numbers.
s0020: Jing Hou seventeenth year, Zhou Li Wang confused and tyrannical, people rebelled, Li Wang fled to Zhi, ministers administered government, therefore called 'Republican'.
s0021: Eighteenth year, Jing Hou died, son Xi Hou Si Tu ascended.
s0022: Xi Hou fourteenth year, Zhou Xuan Wang first ascended.
s0023: Eighteenth year, Xi Hou died, son Xian Hou Ji ascended.
s0024: Xian Hou eleventh year died, son Mu Hou Fei Wang ascended.
s0025: Mu Hou fourth year, took Qi woman Jiang clan as wife.
s0027: Gave birth to crown prince Qiu.
s0028: Tenth year, attacked Qian Mu, had merit.
s0029: Gave birth to younger son, named Cheng Shi.
s0030: Jin person Shi Fu said: 'Strange indeed, lord's naming sons!
s0031: Crown prince called Qiu, qiu means enemy.
s0032: Younger son called Cheng Shi, Cheng Shi great name, one who completes it.
s0035: Now legitimate and concubine names reverse, after this Jin how can it not be chaotic?'
s0037: Twenty-seventh year, Mu Hou died, younger brother Shang Shu self-established, crown prince Qiu fled.
s0038: Shang Shu third year, Zhou Xuan Wang passed away.
s0039: Fourth year, Mu Hou crown prince Qiu led his followers attacked Shang Shu and established, this was Wen Hou.
s0040: Wen Hou tenth year, Zhou You Wang without way, Quanrong killed You Wang, Zhou moved east.
s0041: And Qin Xiang Gong first ranked as feudal lord.
s0042: Thirty-fifth year, Wen Hou Qiu died, son Zhao Hou Bo ascended.
s0043: Zhao Hou first year, enfeoffed Wen Hou younger brother Cheng Shi at Quwo.
s0046: Cheng Shi enfeoffed at Quwo, titled Huan Shu.
s0047: Jing Hou concubine grandson Luan Bin assisted Huan Shu.
s0048: Huan Shu at this time was fifty-eight years old, fond of virtue, Jin state's multitudes all attached to him.
s0049: Gentleman said: 'Jin chaos will be at Quwo.
s0050: Branch greater than root and gets people's hearts, not chaotic what wait!'
s0052: Seventh year, Jin minister Pan Fu assassinated his ruler Zhao Hou and welcomed Quwo Huan Shu.
s0053: Huan Shu wished to enter Jin, Jin people sent troops to attack Huan Shu.
s0054: Huan Shu defeated, returned to Quwo.
s0055: Jin people together established Zhao Hou son Ping as ruler, this was Xiao Hou.
s0057: Xiao Hou eighth year, Quwo Huan Shu died, son Jia Huan Shu, this was Quwo Zhuang Bo.
s0058: Xiao Hou fifteenth year, Quwo Zhuang Bo assassinated his ruler Jin Xiao Hou at Yi.
s0059: Jin people attacked Quwo Zhuang Bo, Zhuang Bo again entered Quwo.
s0060: Jin people again established Xiao Hou son Xi as ruler, this was E Hou.
s0062: Quwo Zhuang Bo heard Jin E Hou died, then raised troops to attack Jin.
s0063: Zhou Ping Wang sent Guo Gong to lead troops attack Quwo Zhuang Bo, Zhuang Bo fled to defend Quwo.
s0064: Jin people together established E Hou son Guang, this was Ai Hou.
s0065: Ai Hou second year Quwo Zhuang Bo died, son Cheng replaced Zhuang Bo, this was Quwo Wu Gong.
s0066: Ai Hou sixth year, Lu assassinated its ruler Yin Gong.
s0067: Ai Hou eighth year, Jin invaded Xing Ting.
s0068: Xing Ting with Quwo Wu Gong plotted, ninth year, attacked Jin at Fen side, captured Ai Hou.
s0069: Jin people then established Ai Hou son Xiao Zi as ruler, this was Xiao Zi Hou.
s0070: Xiao Zi first year, Quwo Wu Gong had Han Wan kill the captured Jin Ai Hou.
s0071: Quwo increasingly strong, Jin had no way with it.
s0072: Jin Xiao Zi fourth year, Quwo Wu Gong lured and summoned Jin Xiao Zi killed him.
s0073: Zhou Huan Wang sent Guo Zhong attack Quwo Wu Gong, Wu Gong entered Quwo, then established Jin Ai Hou younger brother Min as Jin Hou.
s0074: Jin Hou Min fourth year, Song seized Zheng Ji Zhong and established Tu as Zheng ruler.
s0075: Jin Hou nineteenth year, Qi person Guan Zhi Fu assassinated his ruler Xiang Gong.
s0076: Jin Hou twenty-eighth year, Qi Huan Gong began hegemony.
s0077: Quwo Wu Gong attacked Jin Hou Min, extinguished him, completely used his precious vessels as bribes offered to Zhou Xi Wang.
s0078: Xi Wang commanded Quwo Wu Gong as Jin ruler, ranked as feudal lord, thereupon completely annexed Jin territory and possessed it.
s0079: Quwo Wu Gong already ascended thirty-seven years, changed title to Jin Wu Gong.
s0080: Jin Wu Gong began capital at Jin state, previously ascended at Quwo, total years thirty-eight.
s0081: Wu Gong surnamed Cheng, was formerly Jin Mu Hou great-grandson, Quwo Huan Shu grandson.
s0082: Huan Shu was first enfeoffed at Quwo.
s0083: Wu Gong was Zhuang Bo son.
s0084: From Huan Shu first enfeoffed Quwo until Wu Gong extinguished Jin, altogether sixty-seven years, and finally replaced Jin as feudal lord.
s0085: Wu Gong replaced Jin two years, died.
s0086: With Quwo total years, ascended altogether thirty-nine years died.
s0087: Son Xian Gong Gui Zhu ascended.
s0088: Xian Gong first year, Zhou Hui Wang younger brother Hui attacked Hui Wang, Hui Wang fled, resided at Zheng Li Yi.
s0089: Fifth year, attacked Li Rong, obtained Li Ji, Li Ji younger brother, both loved and favored them.
s0090: Eighth year, Shi Wei advised duke saying: "Former Jin various dukes many, not executed, chaos will arise."
s0091: Then had all dukes executed, and walled gathered capital it, named Jiang, began capital at Jiang.
s0092: Ninth year, Jin various dukes already fled to Guo, Guo because of this twice attacked Jin, not conquered.
s0093: Tenth year, Jin wished to attack Guo, Shi Wei said: "Wait for their chaos."
s0095: Twelfth year, Li Ji gave birth to Xi Qi.
s0096: Xian Gong had intention to depose crown prince, then said: "Quwo is my ancestors ancestral temples location, and Pu borders Qin, Qu borders Di, not make various sons reside there, I fear."
s0097: Thereupon made crown prince Shen Sheng reside at Quwo, duke Chong Er reside at Pu, duke Yi Wu reside at Qu.
s0098: Xian Gong with Li Ji son Xi Qi resided at Jiang.
s0099: Jin state because of this knew crown prince would not be established.
s0100: Crown prince Shen Sheng, his mother Qi Huan Gong woman, called Qi Jiang, died early.
s0101: Shen Sheng same mother younger sister was Qin Mu Gong wife.
s0102: Chong Er mother was Di Fox clan woman.
s0103: Yi Wu mother was Chong Er mother younger sister.
s0104: Xian Gong sons eight people, and crown prince Shen Sheng, Chong Er, Yi Wu all had worthy conduct.
s0105: When obtained Li Ji, then distanced these three sons.
s0106: Sixteenth year, Jin Xian Gong made two armies.
s0107: Duke led upper army, crown prince Shen Sheng led lower army, Zhao Shu drove chariot, Bi Wan was right, attacked extinguished Huo, extinguished Wei, extinguished Geng.
s0108: Returned, for crown prince walled Quwo, granted Zhao Shu Geng, granted Bi Wan Wei, made them dukes.
s0109: Shi Wei said: "Crown prince cannot be established.
s0110: Divide capital cities for him, and position with dukes, first make extreme for him, moreover how can establish!
s0111: Better escape, not make crime reach.
s0112: Be like Wu Taibo, not also acceptable, still have good name."
s0114: Bu Yan said: "Bi Wan descendants must be great.
s0117: With this begin reward, heaven opens it.
s0118: Son of Heaven called myriad people, feudal lords called ten thousand people, now command it great, to follow full number, must have multitudes."
s0119: Initially, Bi Wan divined service at Jin state, encountered Tun with Bi.
s0121: Tun solid Bi enter, auspicious who greater.
s0124: Seventeenth year, Jin Hou made crown prince Shen Sheng attack Dong Shan.
s0125: Li Ke admonished Xian Gong said: "Crown prince upholds ancestral sacrifices society millet offerings, to morning evening inspect lord meals, therefore called eldest son.
s0126: Lord travels then guards, has guard then follows, follows called soothes army, guards called oversees state, ancient system.
s0127: Leading troops is specialized action planning;
s0128: Oathing troops is lord and state affairs planning: not crown prince matters.
s0129: Troops in commanding orders only, receiving orders then not awe-inspiring, specialized orders then not filial, therefore lord heir cannot lead troops.
s0130: Lord loses his office, leading troops not awe-inspiring, will what use?"
s0131: Duke said: "I have sons, not know crown prince who establish."
s0132: Li Ke not answer withdrew, saw crown prince.
s0133: Crown prince said: "I will be deposed?"
s0135: Teach with military, not share this fear, why depose?
s0136: Moreover you fear not filial, not fear not establish.
s0137: Cultivate self not blame others, then avoid difficulty."
s0138: Crown prince led troops, duke clothed him one-sided robe, belted him gold jade.
s0139: Li Ke declined illness, not follow crown prince.
s0140: Crown prince then attacked Dong Shan.
s0141: Nineteenth year, Xian Gong said: "Initially my former lords Zhuang Bo, Wu Gong executed Jin chaos, and Guo often assisted Jin attack me, also hid Jin fled dukes, indeed made chaos.
s0142: Not execute, afterward leave descendants worry."
s0143: Then made Xun Xi with Qu produce chariot borrow road at Yu.
s0144: Yu borrowed road, then attacked Guo, took its Xia Yang to return.
s0145: Xian Gong privately told Li Ji: "I wish to depose crown prince, use Xi Qi replace him."
s0146: Li Ji wept said: "Crown prince establishment, feudal lords all already know, and repeatedly leads troops, hundred surnames attach to him, how with lowly concubine sake depose legitimate establish concubine?
s0147: Lord must do it, concubine will suicide."
s0148: Li Ji outwardly praised crown prince, but secretly had people slander evil crown prince, wished to establish her son.
s0149: Twenty-first year, Li Ji told crown prince: "Lord dreamed saw Qi Jiang, crown prince quickly sacrifice at Quwo, return blessing to lord."
s0150: Crown prince then sacrificed his mother Qi Jiang at Quwo, offered his roasted meat to Xian Gong.
s0151: Xian Gong at this time went hunting, placed roasted meat in palace.
s0152: Li Ji had people place poison in roasted meat.
s0153: After two days, Xian Gong from hunting came back, butcher presented roasted meat to Xian Gong, Xian Gong wished to eat it.
s0154: Li Ji from side stopped him, said: "Roasted meat from far, should test it."
s0157: Gave to small minister, small minister died.
s0158: Li Ji wept said: "Crown prince how cruel!
s0159: His father yet wishes to assassinate replace him, moreover others?
s0160: Moreover lord old, morning evening person, yet cannot wait wishes to assassinate him!"
s0161: Told Xian Gong: "Crown prince does this, only because concubine and Xi Qi sake.
s0162: Concubine wishes mother and son avoid to other state, if early suicide, not make mother and son become crown prince fish meat.
s0163: Initially lord wished to depose him, concubine still resented it;
s0164: Until now, concubine especially loses herself in this."
s0165: Crown prince heard it, fled to Xin Cheng.
s0166: Xian Gong angered, then executed his tutor Du Yuan Kui.
s0167: Someone told crown prince: "Made this poison was Li Ji, crown prince why not personally explain clarify it?"
s0168: Crown prince said: "My lord old, without Li Ji, sleeps not peaceful, eats not sweet.
s0169: If explain it, lord moreover will anger her.
s0171: Someone told crown prince: "Can flee to other state."
s0172: Crown prince said: "Bear this evil name to leave, who will accept me?
s0174: Twelfth month wu shen, Shen Sheng suicided at Xin Cheng.
s0175: At this time Chong Er, Yi Wu came to court.
s0176: Person or told Li Ji: "Two dukes resent Li Ji slandered killed crown prince."
s0177: Li Ji feared, because slandered two dukes: "Shen Sheng poison roasted meat, two dukes knew it."
s0178: Two sons heard it, feared, Chong Er fled Pu, Yi Wu fled Qu, defended their cities, self-prepared guard.
s0179: Initially, Xian Gong made Shi Wei for two dukes build Pu, Qu cities, not completed.
s0180: Yi Wu with this told duke, duke angered Shi Wei.
s0181: Shi Wei apologized said: "Border cities few bandits, what use?"
s0182: Retired and sang: "Fox fur thick, one state three dukes, I who follow!"
s0184: When Shen Sheng died, two sons also returned defended their cities.
s0185: Twenty-second year, Xian Gong angered two sons not explain left, indeed had plotting, then sent troops attacked Pu.
s0186: Pu person eunuch Bo Di commanded Chong Er hurry suicide.
s0187: Chong Er climbed wall, eunuch pursued cut his robe sleeve.
s0188: Chong Er then fled to Di.
s0189: Sent people attack Qu, Qu city defended, could not take.
s0190: This year, Jin again borrowed road at Yu to attack Guo.
s0191: Yu duke Gong Zhi Qi admonished Yu lord: "Jin cannot borrow road, this will extinguish Yu."
s0192: Yu lord said: "Jin is my same surname, should not attack me."
s0193: Gong Zhi Qi said: "Tai Bo, Yu Zhong, Tai Wang sons, Tai Bo fled, therefore not succeed.
s0194: Guo Zhong, Guo Shu, Wang Ji sons, were Wen Wang ministers, their merit record in royal chamber, stored in alliance repository.
s0195: Will extinguish Guo, what love for Yu?
s0196: Moreover Yu relation can closer than Huan, Zhuang clan?
s0197: Huan, Zhuang clan what crime, completely extinguished them.
s0198: Yu and Guo are lips and teeth, lips gone then teeth cold."
s0199: Yu Gong not listen, then permitted Jin.
s0200: Gong Zhi Qi with his clan left Yu.
